mapper.select: SELECT n.nid ,n.title,n.creat_time, np.photo_src,n.uid,username,photo FROM note n LEFT JOIN (SELECT b.npid,b.nid,b.photo_src FROM (SELECT min(npid) npid,nid from note_photo GROUP BY nid) a LEFT JOIN note_photo b ON a.npid=b.npid) np ON n.nid = np.nid LEFT JOIN user ON n.uid = user.uid

SELECT n.nid ,n.title, n.content, n.creat_time ,np.photo_src,n.uid, user.username,user.photo, nc.nc_content,nc.nc_creat_time ,nc.uid cuid, npd.product_src, cmuser.uid cmUid, cmuser.username cmUsername,cmuser.photo cmPhoto FROM note n LEFT JOIN note_photo np ON n.nid = np.nid LEFT JOIN user ON n.uid = user.uid LEFT JOIN note_comment nc ON n.nid = nc.nid LEFT JOIN note_product npd ON n.nid = npd.nid LEFT JOIN user cmuser ON nc.uid = cmuser.uid WHERE n.nid= #{nid}

SELECT n.nid ,n.title,n.creat_time, np.photo_src,n.uid,username,photo FROM note n LEFT JOIN (SELECT b.npid,b.nid,b.photo_src FROM (SELECT min(npid) npid,nid from note_photo GROUP BY nid) a LEFT JOIN note_photo b ON a.npid=b.npid) np ON n.nid = np.nid LEFT JOIN user ON n.uid = user.uid
AND n.title LIKE #{condition} OR user.username LIKE #{condition}
